K10D0305_H0308:201b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0305_H0308:201b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-5: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-6: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa
K10D0305_H0308:201b-7: ka gnas par dbyar ngas par dam bcas te bzhugs
K10D0305_H0308:201b-8: so // der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-10: 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-12: sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-13: chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-15: de la sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-16: sems can rkang med rnams sam /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-20: gzugs can rnams sam gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-22: 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-23: 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste /
K10D0305_H0308:201b-24: de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0305_H0308:201b-25: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0305_H0308:202a-0: sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba @202a *//
K10D0305_H0308:202a-1: su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-2: mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam
K10D0305_H0308:202a-3: par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur
K10D0305_H0308:202a-4: pa rnams sam / mi rnams kyi nang du mir
K10D0305_H0308:202a-5: gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar
K10D0305_H0308:202a-7: 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0305_H0308:202a-8: chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-10: 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-11: de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral pa'i chos mchog yin par bstan to //
K10D0305_H0308:202a-12: chos la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-13: mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-14: mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-15: rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-16: mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi
K10D0305_H0308:202a-17: mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste
K10D0305_H0308:202a-18: / 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o; ;dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na /
K10D0305_H0308:202a-23: de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0305_H0308:202a-24: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0305_H0308:202a-25: rnams kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par
K10D0305_H0308:202a-26: bstan to // dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba
K10D0305_H0308:202b-0: su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog @202b la mngon
K10D0305_H0308:202b-2: mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam
K10D0305_H0308:202b-3: par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur
K10D0305_H0308:202b-4: pa rnams sam / mi rnams kyi nang du mir
K10D0305_H0308:202b-5: gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar
K10D0305_H0308:202b-7: 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0305_H0308:202b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0305_H0308:202b-9: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K10D0305_H0308:202b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
